name: Bird Barer
description:
With the mantle of Bird Barer you must expose as many hidden birds from their clouds and capture them for unharmful testing.
To do so, you can hold left mouse button over the clouds, and click to snare a bird. You can also give up for the day and restart with "R", or give up the title with escape.
How many you captured is instinctively known to you at the end, but also how many you missed. Oh well, at least the next day will bring different clouds with different birds...
Made for the 358th One Hour Game Jam
